Wlj:SlimeInAJar.NAME: Slime in a Jar
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose one type from #b3 #yWorkers and add #b
Wlj:SlimeInAJar.FLAVOR: From the series 'Wang Lao Ju Teaches You to Host a Slime Rancher'.

Wlj:Peglin.NAME: Peglin
Wlj:Peglin.FLAVOR: From 'Wang Lao Ju Teaches Goblin Art'.

Wlj:Cup.NAME: Poison Masturbation Cup
DESCRIPTIONS: stacks of #yPoison; if the enemy dies from poison damage, recover this poison.
Wlj:Cup.FLAVOR: From 'Wang Lao Ju's Dark Soul Journey 12'. The cup is used by WangLJ to describe the statues in Black Gulch in Dark Souls 2.

Wlj:Fire.NAME: Flame Hu Ge
Wlj:Fire.FLAVOR: From 'Demon's Souls Remastered' series. Hu Ge is a famous Chinese actor whose name sounds like 'pot' in Chinese.

Wlj:Ball.NAME: Useless Balloon
DESCRIPTIONS: Automatically use and copy the reward #b
Wlj:Ball.FLAVOR: From the 'Wang Lao Ju Sekiro' series, originally named Mibu Balloon of Wealth, which is, in fact, useless but can be found everywhere.
